con:testCase.name: CreditorConfirm_Approve_IBAN
con:testCase.con:description:
CreditorCreate_Confirm_Approve Request for IBAN Account
Description related to Steps :
DB Properties : Database connection string for different environments Properties : Test Data for Predefined API's to ferform action DB Connection : Set the connection string based on the environment selected to execute

con:testStep.name: ReadMe
con:testStep.con:description:
Need to add Bank in application.yml file to avoid auto confirm and auto approve
add 4201 Bank for example predefinedcreditor: forceapprove: banks: '4201' forceconfirm: banks: '4201'
Restart the server
File Path : /eos/d4/pin/i1/releases/LATEST/resources (Specific to Environment choosen)

con:config.con:expectedResult: Bank should be added in application.yml file and server should be restarted

con:request.name: CreditorCreate
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>CPS</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:CreditorCreateRequest> <urn:creditorInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:type>INTERNATIONAL</urn1:type> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:currencyCode>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn1:currencyCode> <urn1:creditorAccount>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn1:creditorAccount> <urn1:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>Creditor</urn2:name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType>
<urn2:department>test1</urn2:department><urn2:subDepartment>test1</urn2:subDepartment><urn2:streetName>test1</urn2:streetName><urn2:buildingNumber>321</urn2:buildingNumber><urn2:postCode>71092</urn2:postCode><urn2:townName>test1</urn2:townName><urn2:countrySubDivision>test1</urn2:countrySubDivision><urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:ultimateCreditor> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>Cred</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:addressType>DLVY</urn2:addressType> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:department>Test</urn2:department> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:subDepartment>Test</urn2:subDepartment> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:streetName>Test</urn2:streetName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:buildingNumber>1234</urn2:buildingNumber> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>91052</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>Erlangen</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>Test9</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:ultimateCreditor> <urn1:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic> <urn2:postalAddress>
<urn2:addressType>PBOX</urn2:addressType><urn2:department>test1</urn2:department><urn2:subDepartment>test1</urn2:subDepartment><urn2:streetName>test1</urn2:streetName><urn2:buildingNumber>test1</urn2:buildingNumber><urn2:postCode>71092</urn2:postCode><urn2:townName>test1</urn2:townName><urn2:countrySubDivision>test1</urn2:countrySubDivision><urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:supplierNumber>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn1:supplierNumber> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn:creditorInformation> </urn:CreditorCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from PDC_PREDEFINEDCREDITOR where SUPPLIERNUMBER = '${CreditorCreate#RawRequest#declare namespace urn1='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1'; declare namespace urn='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //urn:CreditorCreateRequest[1]/urn:creditorInformation[1]/urn1:supplierNumber[1]}'

select * from PDC_AGENT where FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID = '${CreditorCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //ns4:CreditorCreateResponse[1]/ns4:predefinedCreditorId[1]}'

select * from PDC_PARTY where FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID = '${CreditorCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //ns4:CreditorCreateResponse[1]/ns4:predefinedCreditorId[1]}' order by PARTYID asc

con:request.name: CreditorConfirm
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>CPS</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:CreditorConfirmRequest> <urn:predefinedCreditorId>${CreditorCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //ns4:CreditorCreateResponse[1]/ns4:predefinedCreditorId[1]}</urn:predefinedCreditorId> </urn:CreditorConfirmRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from PDC_PREDEFINEDCREDITOR where SUPPLIERNUMBER = '${CreditorCreate#RawRequest#declare namespace urn1='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1'; declare namespace urn='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //urn:CreditorCreateRequest[1]/urn:creditorInformation[1]/urn1:supplierNumber[1]}'

con:request.name: CreditorApprove
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>CPS</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:CreditorApproveRequest>\r <urn:predefinedCreditorId>${CreditorCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //ns4:CreditorCreateResponse[1]/ns4:predefinedCreditorId[1]}</urn:predefinedCreditorId>\r </urn:CreditorApproveRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from PDC_PREDEFINEDCREDITOR where SUPPLIERNUMBER = '${CreditorCreate#RawRequest#declare namespace urn1='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1'; declare namespace urn='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //urn:CreditorCreateRequest[1]/urn:creditorInformation[1]/urn1:supplierNumber[1]}'
